revised_title: Further Investigations on the Sense of Sight in Birds
tldr: The author examines the differences in eye structures of various bird species to understand their remarkable vision capabilities. They discuss the importance of considering the specific bird species and dissection methods in understanding the function of the ciliary muscle. The author presents a table comparing the development of the ciliary muscle in different birds, aiming to provide data for determining their visual powers.
